turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, what can i do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I would like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's make them all in medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. what toppings would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I would like two of them to be pepperoni lovers. And I would like the other two to be hamburger, bacon, and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like Bela Luna is currently not serving hamburger pizzas at the moment. should we try another flavor?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Let's go ahead and make it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about sausage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, so two sausage pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And also, the other two I want to be Pepperoni Lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know, I actually want them to all be thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! any special instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just make sure that they are thick crust, and that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me confirm your order: 4 medium pizzas. 2 pepperoni, 2 sausage, all of them thick crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And make sure the pepperonis are like pepperoni lovers, so lots of pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, lots of pepperoni will be added to the special instructions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $63.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Sounds perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye-bye.
